name: cybercando-driver-tracking
description: Real-time driver location tracking system for CyberCando transport platform

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.copy:frontend: node -e "try { const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); if (!fs.existsSync('public')) fs.mkdirSync('public', {recursive:true}); if (fs.existsSync('dashboard/web/dist')) fs.cpSync('dashboard/web/dist', 'public', {recursive:true}); console.log('Frontend copied to public directory'); } catch(e) { console.log('Could not copy frontend: ' + e.message); }"
scripts.install-deps: cd dashboard/api && npm install && cd ../web && npm install

author: CyberCando Team
